title: Nigel Farage – 2023 Comments After Commons Report Published that Boris Johnson Knowingly Lied to Parliament
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Nigel Farage, the former Leader of the Brexit Party, on Twitter on 15 June 2023.
content:
The report is brutal. A 90 day ban from the Commons and a removal of his pass looks vindictive. But, I said at the time that he was misleading the House. He gave his opponents far too much ammunition.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
  *[UCL]: University College London
  *[HIV]: human immunodeficiency virus
  *[AI]: artificial intelligence
